alert.note: Alert for Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 19 at 8:00AM EDT until further notice by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is occurring on the Saluda River downstream of Ware Shoals Dam. * WHERE...Along a portion of the Saluda River, in Abbeville, Greenwood and Laurens Counties, South Carolina. * WHEN...Until 345 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Irving Pitts Memorial Park is closed due to flooding, and Power House Road may be covered with water. Other low-lying areas along the Saluda River, downstream of Ware Shoals Dam, also may experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 751 AM EDT, Dam operator and local law enforcement have reported flooding in the advisory area. Minor flooding is already occurring. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain fell across the area Sunday night and Monday. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ware Shoals and Lake Greenwood. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
